review:
Namaste!
The kitchen is like an ocean fed by rivers big and small
rainwater and underwater sources.

Dishes at our establishment are inspired by authentic Indian flavors,
filled with vibes of large western cities to which Indian cuisine came with the diaspora.
Indian cuisine adapts and changes like a living organism,
adjusts to the preferences of the country in which it has taken root.

Everyone will find in it their own notes, tones and semitones for inspiration.
name: Vijaya Lakshmi
